languages.text: Массивная трибуна возвышается над провалом в основной храм — смелое архитектурное решение, которое может обернуться катастрофой с помощью одного меткого выстрела.

traits.locale_text: [DRAFT] Барк в основном пространстве палубы (про трибуну для Торговца)

languages.text: A massive podium rises above the gap in the main temple — a bold architectural decision that could turn into a disaster with a well-placed shot.
languages.original_text: Массивная трибуна возвышается над провалом в основной храм — смелое архитектурное решение, которое может обернуться катастрофой с помощью одного меткого выстрела.

traits.locale_text: A massive podium rises above the gap in the main temple — a bold architectural decision that could turn into a disaster with a well-placed shot.
A massive podium rises above the gap in the main temple — a bold architectural decision that could turn into a disaster with a well-placed shot.
A massive podium rises above the gap in the main temple — a bold architectural decision that could turn into a disaster with a well-placed shot.

languages.text: 巨大的颂唱台耸立在神殿主殿的空隙之上。只要在合适的位置来上一炮，这大胆的建筑设计就会酿成一场可怕的灾难。
languages.original_text: A massive podium rises above the gap in the main temple — a bold architectural decision that could turn into a disaster with a well-placed shot.

traits.locale_text: 巨大的颂唱台耸立在神殿主殿的空隙之上。只要在合适的位置来上一炮，这大胆的建筑设计就会酿成一场可怕的灾难。

languages.text: Un gigantesco podio se alza sobre el vacío del templo principal, una atrevida decisión arquitectónica que podría acabar en desastre de un solo disparo certero.
languages.original_text: A massive podium rises above the gap in the main temple — a bold architectural decision that could turn into a disaster with a well-placed shot.

traits.locale_text: Un gigantesco podio se alza sobre el vacío del templo principal, una atrevida decisión arquitectónica que podría acabar en desastre de un solo disparo certero.

languages.text: 巨大な壇が大聖堂の中央の空間にそびえ立っている。建築上、大胆な決定だが、狙いを定めた砲弾で大惨事になる可能性がある。
languages.original_text: A massive podium rises above the gap in the main temple — a bold architectural decision that could turn into a disaster with a well-placed shot.

traits.locale_text: 巨大な演壇が神殿の隙間の上からのぞく。建築上、大胆な決定だが、狙いを定めた砲弾で大惨事になる可能性がある。
巨大な壇が大聖堂の中央の空間にそびえ立っている。建築上、大胆な決定だが、狙いを定めた砲弾で大惨事になる可能性がある。

languages.text: Un énorme podium s'élève au-dessus de la trouée du temple principal, un choix architectural audacieux qui pourrait virer au drame avec un tir bien placé.
languages.original_text: A massive podium rises above the gap in the main temple — a bold architectural decision that could turn into a disaster with a well-placed shot.

traits.locale_text: Un énorme podium s'élève au-dessus de la trouée du temple principal, un choix architectural audacieux qui pourrait virer au drame avec un tir bien placé.

languages.text: Über der Lücke im Haupttempel erhebt sich ein enormes Podium – eine architektonisch mutige Entscheidung, könnte doch bereits ein gezielter Schuss zur Katastrophe führen.
languages.original_text: A massive podium rises above the gap in the main temple — a bold architectural decision that could turn into a disaster with a well-placed shot.

traits.locale_text: Über der Lücke im Haupttempel erhebt sich ein enormes Podium – eine architektonisch mutige Entscheidung, könnte doch bereits ein gezielter Schuss zur Katastrophe führen.

languages.text: Ana tapınaktaki boşluğun üzerinde devasa bir podyum yükseliyor. Silahından çıkacak isabetli bir mermiyle felakete dönüşebilecek cüretkâr bir mimari karar.
languages.original_text: A massive podium rises above the gap in the main temple — a bold architectural decision that could turn into a disaster with a well-placed shot.

traits.locale_text: Ana tapınaktaki boşluğun üzerinde devasa bir podyum yükseliyor. Silahından çıkacak isabetli bir mermiyle felakete dönüşebilecek cüretkâr bir mimari karar.
